original_text: And he captured a young man of Succoth and questioned him. And he wrote down for him the officials and elders of Succoth, seventy-seven men.
korean_text: 숙곳 사람 중 한 소년을 잡아 그를 심문하매 그가 숙곳의 방백들과 장로들 칠십칠 명을 그에게 적어 준지라

sentences.original_text: And he captured a young man of Succoth
And he wrote down for him the officials and elders of Succoth
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그에게 숙곳의 방백과 장로들을 적어 주었다
